comment: Professor Komal is wonderful.  She loves her work, and she shows it in class.  The exams are the same format throughout.  She is willing to recalculate your grade if you ask her.  I made an A in her class.  I would take a different class that she teaches.

She is a horrible instructor!  She makes us read senseless material and expect us to know what it means.  She gives us test questions on terms that she mentions once, while talking about something else.  Other professors would gives logic behind the works.  Patel just makes the works sound silly. Just take World Literature with someone else.

Komal grades fair, however you need to do the work. She seems helpful and is an email away from answering questions. However, after experiencing being online, I would rather have a face-to-face interaction. Sometimes I felt alone, even though there were online discussion with other students. I would still recommend the class if you want online.

Awesome prof!! Challenging assignments, but always willing to help. Grades VERY quickly, with clear explanations as to why you got that grade. Answers emails quickly. Overall great! I would definitely recommend!

She's great! She's interesting and engaging and despite her ethnicity she has no accent and isn't hard to understand at all. Her tests are easy and the stuff she makes you read is actually fun. I recommend her, you will get an A!

By far my favorite professor. I highly recommend you take her. The papers could be difficult, but she was always open to help with whatever you needed. Some homework, but not too much. And the class was actually fun!
Such a good teacher. Very interesting class and very helpful when it comes to writing papers. Fun class and great professor!!
Loved her. Great teacher; friendly, supportive, tells you exactly what she wants. Grades essays well and tells you where you need to improve.

Professor Mathew is very helpful and concise on what is needed and required. Unsure if other teachers are the same, but Mrs. Mathew requires a lot of public speaking. If you do not like speaking and presenting in front of the class, I'd recommend someone else. If not, enjoy!

I took her online and she is very helpful. She is very clear on what she wants and really cares about her students. You write three major papers and several little peer reviews on articles and each other's papers. I would highly recommend taking Prof. Patel-Matthews, she is the best!

I absolutely LOVED this class. I have never been someone to enjoy reading or writing, but I actually never wanted to miss her class. The environment is so encouraging and she is INCREADIBLY helpful. After you write a paper she schedules a private 10 minute time with you to review your paper and tell you how you did and how you can do better.

ENGL 1101 honors. She is very nice and helpful. Read the assigned books. There are only four main writing assignments. Make sure you go through the rubric for each essay, and use it as a checklist, and you should do well . Her grading is fair, and she explains what she is expecting. Overall, it is a fairly easy A, and I don't enjoy writing.
What more can i say, extremely awesome!!! we had 3 papers and i group project that was too easy. take her if you want a good grade

Took the online class during the summer. Very easy! I recommend  meeting with her to review paper before submitting final draft. I always did this and got a 96 (A) on every paper. Got a 97 (A) on the final paper. Read her class notes handouts to find answers to the quizzes. MLA reference book was a waste of money.

I really enjoyed and learned alot in this class.She's extremely helpful.Use the writing center,it's very helpful!!!!! Not an easy A. But she's a very good teacher you just have to put in the effort. Read for the quizes (these let me down).I think people just want everything to be handed to them. The world is not an easy place. She's a good teacher.

I love writing but she want business research papers. Has you try to become an entrepreneur instead of reading and analyzing great literature. Typical young teacher, tries too hard and ends up making ridiculous assignments. Everything is public too. Peer editing is for high school and a waste of class time. Made an A but did not enjoy this class.

Best teacher Ever! i will definitely sign up for her class in 1102. 4 essays throughout the year, that the class will review before you turn it in. She will also help out with your essays in her office hours.
Best English teacher I've had.

I am taking her online class and its easy. 3 papers a few quizzes and some peer reviews and analysis'. You will use the book Good Reasons you don't ever use the Writers Reference book though. She is nice and very helpful.

I took the online class and like any other online course there is a lot of reading.  Professor is not good with feedback.  I would not recommend taking an online English class if English is not your strong suit.  I do not feel that I learned anything from this class at all.  I received a B but really had to work at it to get that grade.

I really enjoyed Ms. Patel's class. She made everything so interesting. The stories she chose for us to read were actually enjoyable. The tests are matching key terms from the notes and 4 essay questions based on the books you read and poems that she provides for you on the test itself. I would definitely take another one of her classes!

This class was great. Professor Patel chooses really interesting pieces of literature to discuss. She is very helpful and respectful of students' opinions/interpretations of the material. There aren't very many grades, but most of the tests and such are easy. My only complaint is that the attendance policy is a bit strict. Definitely recommended!

I absolutely loved her! She has been my favorite teacher so far. She allows a long period of time to write papers so you have time to meet with her or someone in the writing center. I love the peer reviews we dud in class--so helpful!! She meets one on one with students to review papers so you know what to watch out for on the next paper. I've never liked English classes in high school, but after this class I'm considering an English education major.

Take her World Lit class, especially if you love the subject. The tests really aren't that hard if you put effort into connecting the works we read and look over the terms. Weekly quizzes are easy. Patel is very approachable and incredibly kind. Definitely open to further discussion and I always left feeling like I had a fulfilling conversation.
The best English teacher I have ever had.  If you can take her, do it.  She makes you think, and is extremely nice and understanding.

Took class online - assignments were clear.  I printed all class material and organized it at the beginning of course.  Three papers to write, weekly writing assignments analyzing articles and doing peer reviews.  Follow "Good Reasons" textbook - refer to it in all your analysis and peer reviews and you'll do well.  Prof Patel is also very helpful!

3 tests, Quizzes, & partcipation. Hardest tests ever! 40points matching, the rest 3 essay questions. Great teacher, really makes you think. Very nice. Hard to study for tests, best to meet with study group out of class to discuss over reaching meaning for each section. Helps to meet with her more than 1 time. Be sure the read the material.

To all the negative comments about this professor being clear, fair, or boring I say you are wrong! This teacher is the best english teacher I have had. She makes you critically think about the stories you read and you do not have to read many. also you do not write papers. Take this professor! You have to work for your grade but it will be fun!

I took Engl 1102 and 2110 with Ms. Patel.Made A's in both. Her excitement for the subject made the class more enjoyable. If you find that you don't like the results of your first test, definitely meet with her and she makes constructive suggestions.The paper at the end took a bit of in-depth thinking. Doesn't have a real final which is GREAT

Patel's great, honestly. Really helpful with papers and her content was interesting and engaging. If you're not an English person then you might have a difficult time with this class, but as a teacher she is really good. Not at all useless, or unclear from my experience. You will work but she is definitely available for consultation. Recommended!

Horrible class and teacher. Absolutely boring material and I love to write. I took this class online and it was a total waste of time. Prof. Patel is very unclear on what she wants turned in and when. When she assigns a paper she expects you took look in several different places to figure out what's expected, instead of giving concise instructions.

Prof ran/taught class like we were in 10th grade again. Group projects were a joke. I have never made less than an A- on any paper I have ever written, and she gave me a C and a B, both on excellent papers. Asked her why, and her answer was very round-about and vague. She's relatively easy but IMO a terrible teacher, and I used to be an EDU major.

Mrs Patel is the type of teacher that acts like your doing great on things, but when you get them back your score will be low. She is a nice teacher on a personality side of things. She picks favorites. If your an average student I suggest not taking this class.

She is amazing! by far the most helpful professor i have EVER had! her assignments are pretty easy if you work on them..she expects you to do your work. the only thing i dont like is the amount of time between papers (not long enough). But overall a GREAT english teacher! TAKE HER!

AWESOME Professor! I would definitely recommend her to anyone. She makes class interesting and the papers are on topics that are fairly easy if you put thought into it. Attendance is mandatory, but that goes for any English class. Overall GREAT! Take Patel!

I am terrible with english but Ms. Patel made it fun.If you have problems just go talk to her, she is more that will to help. Easy A if you attend class. Attendance is a must. Great class and great tacher and would recommend this class to anyone.

Very nice person. Her class requires some reading, but the reading is very interesting. The papers we had to write over the semester weren't that hard. If you're wiling to do work, this class is an easy A. Also, attendance is mandatory!!!

A really sweet professor. She cares about her students, is very kind. You can have up to three absences but then she deducts from your grade. Her class isn't too difficult and an A is definitely something that is guaranteed if you take her class.

My absolute favorite professor! I have taken two classes with her and would again if I could. She does expect you to do your work but she does not assign anything unreasonable. My favorite thing is how much she loves literature, her face lights up when she talks about a work she really likes, it makes you love it too.

She is so nice! I thought she was the best English teacher I have ever had! She creates many ways to fix your paper before the final draft is due. Will grade also by effort if you go to the writing center! I suggest taking her!

I would suggest not taking her class. She grades very hard! She is a nice person, and willing to help, but her class content is extremely hard. Don't expect A's or even high B's on papers unless you go in for help on every single one. Overall, i wouldn't suggest this class.
Great Professor!! She is so sweet and very helpful. This is a pretty easy class if you put forth the effort. Classes weren't boring either.
pretty nice but grades papers hard. helpful if you take the time to ask her questions.

Very great teacher. She explains the material in an easy to understand way. She's fun to listen to, but you do need to go to class ON TIME and read the assignments because there are usually quizzes at the beginning of class. If you want an easy A, do not take, but if you actually enjoy literature, HIGHLY recommend :)

Very Nice. Wonderful teacher. She was always there to read your paper and give advise. We focused a lot on cultural diversity which was very interesting. In class discussions and readings. We were hardly ever on the computers. Overall wrote a few papers.
Medium difficulty with grading. Very nice teacher, though. Just respect her rules and show up for class, you should pass.

She is a great teacher. The classes are interesting because we're always having class discussions about interesting things. She makes the class interesting. The papers are hard, but she will always help you with them. Take her if you can.

She is very nice and she will help you if you come to her, however you have to go to class to know the assignments! She will not post them online and if you miss more than three classes your grade drops a letter grade. Bottom line is show up and ask for help, she is very sweet.

Hard Class. Nice Teacher. Shes very helpful but HARSH GRADER. Very detailed assignments to do. Shes never very clear about what is due next class, never posts those little assignments online so nothing to check. Shes a sweet lady but AH hard class alot of essays, she grades very hard. And 3 absesences and you go down a WHOLE grade letter

Great teacher! She is very nice and is willing to help you when you need it. She will go over your papers with you before you turn them in. She is not easy. You will have to work hard. I ended up with an A, so it is possible.
coolest teacher ever she helps you with anything.

Favorite english teacher I've had! She is incredibly nice and willing to help in any way. English is usually boring to me but she makes class fun and focuses more on discussions than lectures. As long as you do the reading you'll do well. And she is VERY helpful with papers.
she is VERY helpful. she is the best english teacher i have ever taken. Her class discussions are never boring and I had her at 8:00 AM
Great teacher, and willing to help. Makes topics interesting and fosters thought.
She was great. She was so helpful on papers. Make sure you take her advice when you do her papers. He discussions in class were always interesting. If you have the chance to take her, you should.
great professor, disscusses global issues
